    • Method Detail

      • getExecutionStepByChangeRequestId

        public void getExecutionStepByChangeRequestId(java.lang.Integer changeRequestID)
        Gets the execution step by change request id. This method initialize step
        Parameters:
        changeRequestID - - The change request ID

      • updateChangeRequestCurrentStep

        public void updateChangeRequestCurrentStep(java.lang.String newStep,
                                           java.lang.String handlerUserName,
                                           java.lang.Integer changeRequestID)
        Update change request current step.
        Parameters:
        newStep - the new step
        handlerUserName - the handler user name
        changeRequestID - This method update DB change request step to execution approve time Send SQL action to the server in order to update the change request with the sent ID To have the sent step and the following handler user name This method is called by the boundary after submission of the execution time required, In order for the change request to have the step of "EXECUTION_APPRIVE_TIME"

      • closeExecutionStep

        public void closeExecutionStep(java.lang.Integer executionStepId,
                               java.lang.String executionSummary)
        Close execution step.
        Parameters:
        executionStepId - the execution step id
        executionSummary - - the execution summary entered by the execution leader Send SQL action to the server in order to close the execution step with the following ID And also for the step to include the execution summary for future logs and displays This method update DB execution step with the comment

      • advanceChangeRequestToTesterStep

        public void advanceChangeRequestToTesterStep(java.lang.Integer changeRequestID)
        Advance change request to tester step.
        Parameters:
        changeRequestID - - the change request ID This method update current step of the change request sent in DB to tester committee director appoint

      • updateExecutionStepEstimatedEndDate

        public void updateExecutionStepEstimatedEndDate(java.sql.Date estimatedEndDate,
                                                java.lang.Integer executionStepId)
        This method insert new estimated date to execution step and change request .
        Parameters:
        estimatedEndDate - - The estimated end date
        executionStepId - - The execution step ID Send SQL action to the server in order to update the execution step with the new estimated end date

      • getUpdatedChangeRequest

        public void getUpdatedChangeRequest(java.lang.Integer changeRequestID)
        Gets the updated change request.
        Parameters:
        changeRequestID - the change request ID This method is used to get the change request with the sent ID In order for the boundary to decide if the the change request step has changed since the last time it was seen.

      • updateTimeExtensionDB

        public void updateTimeExtensionDB(int stepID,
                                  java.lang.String stepType)
        this method create sql query that update the time extension if necessary .
        Parameters:
        stepID - the step ID
        stepType - the step type Send SQL action to the server to automatically close the time extension incase there was an active time extension request and the step has already finished. Because if the execution leader finished his execution without time extension it was not necessary and should be active anymore in the database
